name: Frame Assembly
description: Bambu Lab A1 structural frame assembly - aluminum extrusion base with vertical columns, horizontal beam, motor mounts, and peripheral mounting points for LCD and spool holder

assemblyOrder.description: Install all four footpads to base frame corner mounting points
Position base frame on level surface, verify stability
Attach Z-motor mount to rear-right of base frame
Mount left Z-column to base frame, verify perpendicular
Mount right Z-column to base frame, verify parallel to left column
Install top horizontal beam connecting both columns, verify level
Attach spool holder arm to rear of top beam
Mount LCD bracket to front-left of base frame

notes: Frame must be assembled on level surface
Verify squareness at each step before proceeding
Z-columns must be perfectly perpendicular for accurate prints
